title: Biopod: A Polyvalent Farm
Why is the Bloomberg terminal so expensive, why do people still pay for it?
text: Couldn't someone with a cheap windows PC and a pair of monitors + misc. data feeds just replicate it for considerably less money? It costs $24k/year for a single subscription. At least with the PC you can install your own software. Bloomberg charging so much still for its services would be like Silicon Graphics still charging $30k for workstations when cheaper alternatives exist.

title: Apple’s Butterfly Keyboard Fiasco Leads to a $50M Settlement
The weird world of the kind-of-deontologist
Ask HN: What's the interest rate on technical debt?
text:
It seems we're now stuck with the term "Technical Debt" to describe things needing cleanup. Non-technical people need a number we can use to express just how expensive putting off cleanup will be to make rational decisions we can all live with.

What is your personal estimate of the interest rate we pay on technical debt?

Also, what units is the denominator in the fraction? Is it code size, functionality, or just calendar time?

Show HN: A better way of version controlling IAC
text:
I believe I've reached a point in my career, and used Terraform enough, that I can confidently say that the semver system for managing IAC code bases simply doesn't cut it anymore.

I'd love more widespread feedback on how I currently propose we version control our IAC. If the feedback is constructive and forthcoming, I'll move this written piece to a more formal location.

This is currently being tested, with extremely positive results, at Cisco (yeah, the networking company.)

Microsoft Teams is down – worldwide?
text:
Error: "Operation failed with unexpected error."

Will update as I find out more.

Singapore, Australia, NZ & Japan confirmed so far.

"We've received reports of users being unable to access Microsoft Teams or leverage any features. We're investigating the issue and further updates can be found in your Service Health Dashboard via TM402718."

https://twitter.com/MSFT365Status/status/1549934141738651648

My partner is still in her meeting in Teams and managed to disconnect and rejoin it. Seems a little odd.
